text: @SpeakerPelosi Pelosi claims that meeting the needs of the AMERICAN people is important yet, she supports defunding the police, Open borders, Sanctuary cities, Globalism and abortion. #Trump2020 #Trump2020Landslide #COVID19 #HeroesAct #ProLife #VoterFraud #BuildTheWall #coronavirus
